Title: The Spy Next Door
Writer: Jonathan Bernstein (screenplay), James Greer (screenplay), Gregory Poirier (screenplay), Jonathan Bernstein (story), James Greer (story)
Actors: Jackie Chan, Amber Valletta, Madeline Carroll, Will Shadley
Plot: Former C.I.A. spy Bob Ho takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids, who haven't exactly warmed to their mom's beau.
